page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MATTHEW
page.content: At about five it's time for tea. We don't have tinned food like most people because we grow our own vegetables and rear our own meat. Mum feeds the animals now and I sometimes help but if she doesn't need me I watch television. I like action-packed films and cartoons. I've written a letter to Dad tonight and now I'm going to bed. I get my pyjamas on and get washed. Then I go to bed and read for half an hour. I'm reading a book with lots of stories in and I'm enjoying them very much. My favourite one is "Car With No Brakes". It has lots of exciting description of a car going down a hill with no brakes. Mum comes up at eight and I go to sleep. Matthew Chappell, aged 11.
